thread.title: First On CNBC: Media Alert: Disney CEO Bob Iger Speaks with CNBC’s Julia Boorstin Today Tuesday May 8 at 4PM ET

title: First On CNBC: Media Alert: Disney CEO Bob Iger Speaks with CNBC’s Julia Boorstin Today Tuesday May 8 at 4PM ET
text:
First On CNBC: Media Alert: Disney CEO Bob Iger Speaks with CNBC’s Julia Boorstin Today Tuesday May 8 at 4PM ET Published 12:31 PM ET Tue, 8 May 2018 CNBC.com
WHERE: CNBC's " Closing Bell "
In a FIRST ON CNBC interview, Disney CEO Bob Iger will speak with CNBC's Julia Boorstin on CNBC's "Closing Bell" (M-F 3PM – 5PM) today, Tuesday, May 8th at 4:00PM ET. Topics will include: earnings, the pending Fox deal, ESPN's new direct to consumer product, and the recent box office success with Black Panther and Avengers.
Transcript to follow the interview.
For more information contact:
